title: Xgboost with Time-Series
text:
the_path <- here::here()
library(glue)
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)


df0 <- read_csv(glue(the_path, "/raw_data/AEP_hourly.csv"))


import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

df0 = pd.read_csv("../../raw_data/AEP_hourly.csv", index_col = [0], parse_dates = [0])

plt.plot(df0)

title: Gini Coefficient of Impurity
text: This article is to review one of the main way trees are being build. When deciding which node to split next, the Gini Coefficient of Impurity is being used.
